subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Although he had only faced Jonathan Broxton a handful of times, Jimmy Rollins looked for a fastball inside and found one, giving the Phillies a three-games-to-one lead.
snippet: Although he had only faced Jonathan Broxton a handful of times, Jimmy Rollins looked for a fastball inside and found one, giving the Phillies a three-games-to-one lead.
